original_title: Cambié Su Nombre Y Seguí Hablando de Ella Sin Que Lo Supieras
overview: Camilo, like many Cuban immigrants, decided to move his life away from the island. Two decades after living in France, Camilo decides to return to the island unlike many immigrants, who never return. Through the streets of Havana, Camilo tells Lázaro how things are there after so many years away.
title: Cambié Su Nombre Y Seguí Hablando de Ella Sin Que Lo Supieras
